metadata.title: Convert CAD to USD – Currency Converter
metadata.description: Convert currency from Canadian Dollars (CAD) to US Dollars (USD), useful for Canadian business and international transactions.

introduction: This converter transforms currency values from Canadian Dollars to US Dollars, enabling cross-border financial transactions.
Canadian businesses and investors frequently convert CAD to USD for trade and investment. Exchange rates significantly impact profitability.
Rates change constantly based on economic conditions, commodity prices, and monetary policy. This converter provides reference rates.
methodology: The CAD to USD exchange rate reflects relative economic strength and commodity prices. Rates change continuously.
Canadian exporters selling to US markets convert CAD to USD. Import costs depend on prevailing exchange rates.
Canadian investors purchasing US assets convert dollars. Exchange rates affect investment returns.
This converter provides reference exchange rates for currency conversion and financial planning.
examples: Example 1 – Canadian export: A Canadian company earning $100,000 CAD converts to approximately $74,000 USD (at 1 CAD = 0.74 USD).
Example 2 – US salary: A Canadian working in the US earning $60,000 CAD annually receives approximately $44,400 USD.
Example 3 – Investment return: A Canadian investor receives $10,000 CAD in dividends, converting to approximately $7,400 USD.

faqs.question: What is the current CAD to USD exchange rate?
faqs.answer: Exchange rates fluctuate daily. Typical rates range from 0.70 to 0.80 USD per CAD. Check live sources for current rates.

faqs.question: How do commodity prices affect CAD?
faqs.answer: Canada exports oil and minerals. Higher commodity prices strengthen CAD against USD.

faqs.question: Where can I exchange CAD to USD?
faqs.answer: Banks, currency brokers, and online platforms offer conversion. Compare rates for the best value.

glossary.definition: Canadian Dollar, official currency of Canada.
US Dollar, official currency of the United States.
